projects.title: Online Confine Dashboard
projects.description: A web dashboard for authenticated users to manage DNS records for subdomains assigned to them.

projects.title: Disq
projects.description: A service which allowed you to upload screenshots (with ShareX support) and create Short URLs.

projects.title: Knok
projects.description: A web UI and server to make an iPad act as a doorbell for my room.

projects.title: Stringy Software API
projects.description: A multi-purpose API used for past versions of my website and various other projects that returned various data.

projects.title: Satori
projects.description: A Discord chat bot that managed XP and provided chat minigames for the Flute Gang community complete with a web dashboard to view stats.

projects.title: Blob Maker
projects.description: A web app to customize your very own blob character. Mainly created to try out VueJS.

projects.title: SwitchPresence
projects.description: An early attempt at using the Discord Game SDK and Electron to show what Nintendo Switch game you're playing.

projects.title: Website v7
projects.description: A scrapped version of this website that used VueJS. I decided not to use it as I wanted to make the site in React.

projects.title: Website v6
projects.description: The last live version of this website that used React + CRA.
